channel.title: Images
channel.description:
I'm currently running a 508 Pali, i forget the exact source.
Excuse me if I am not very experienced with this, I've never been good at editing images and sprites. And I'm thinking this is server sided, but I'm not 100% sure, so if this needs to be moved please say so.
In the source, some of the repeating messages use <img=1>, which shows the gold crown for Jagex Mods. I want to use my own custom crowns, but I don't know where to do that. I've tried using a Sprite compiler and make image "1" my custom crown, but that doesn't work, so I'm thinking it's server sided. I've also tried uploading the custom crown image to a site and then using the url in place of "1", that didn't work either. I can't even find where to declare what image 1 would be so I'm in need of some help, thanks.

item.title: Images
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Hershey Mod Hershey
item.description:
@Mod_Hershey wrote:

I’m currently running a 508 Pali, i forget the exact source.

Excuse me if I am not very experienced with this, I’ve never been good at editing images and sprites. And I’m thinking this is server sided, but I’m not 100% sure, so if this needs to be moved please say so.

In the source, some of the repeating messages use <img=1>, which shows the gold crown for Jagex Mods. I want to use my own custom crowns, but I don’t know where to do that. I’ve tried using a Sprite compiler and make image “1” my custom crown, but that doesn’t work, so I’m thinking it’s server sided. I’ve also tried uploading the custom crown image to a site and then using the url in place of “1”, that didn’t work either. I can’t even find where to declare what image 1 would be so I’m in need of some help, thanks.
